content.text: Yir Tangee was a planet in the Yir Tangee system of the Colonies. It was represented in the Galactic Senate by Havriso Looruya, whom was appointed to the Loyalist Committee, though was censored for having possible Separatist ties. Under the New Order, it received medical supplies from the Carosite freighter Sudden Restoration.

elements.text: Palpatine forms Loyalist Committee—HoloNet News Vol. 531 49
Rodian Senator Uncovers Loyalist-Separatist Ties—HoloNet News Vol. 531 54
Senator Farr Named to Loyalist Committee—HoloNet News Vol. 531 55
